name: Artist: パセリ (旧) | パセリ artist's old painting style
description:
パセリ Style LoRA

中文 | English

仿パセリ的旧作画风格的LoRA模型。新画风见：

Artist: パセリ (新画风) | Parsley artist's new painting style - v1.0 | Stable Diffusion LoRA | Civitai

权重建议值：1 (or 0.6~1.4)

基于模型：Anything-5RE

训练信息：筛选出共计344张原画（含裁剪图），迭代1032步，多分辨率迭代训练。

其他的一些建议：EasyNegative。

LoRA model with a drawing style inspired by パセリ before 2017, the new drawing style:

Artist: パセリ (新画风) | Parsley artist's new painting style - v1.0 | Stable Diffusion LoRA | Civitai

Recommended weight value: 1 (or 0.6~1.4)

Based on the model: Anything-5RE

Training information: Selected a total of 344 original drawings (including cropped images), iterated for 1032 steps, and trained with multi-resolution iteration.

Some other suggestions: EasyNegative.
